pkgmetadata.longdescription: # json-file-splitSplit a json or jsonl file into different chunks.## Installation ```shellpip install json-file-split```## Usage```shelljson-file-split \--input_file_path ./tests/data/test.jsonl \--save_to_dir /tmp/output/ \--output_file_name test.jsonl \--split_by number_of_buckets \--batch_size 10```
